title: Christianity, Perennialism, Trinity and Logos with Timmy of Theosymmetry aka Jedi Scribe
description:
I am joined today but Oluwatimleyin who graciously let me call him Timmy is a young physicist in training who also happens to have a great mind for theology. He has a solid grasp on the neo-Platonic tradition, and well as the thought or perennialist thinkers like Frithjof Schuon and Rene Guenon, and James Cutsinger.  I ask him about his story and his and how he came to be interested in these topics. We touch on his thoughts on the Trinity and the Logos

His blog his called Theosymmetry:

https://theosymmetry.wordpress.com/

he also blogs under Jedi Scribe at 

https://neoplatonicphysicist.medium.com/

He is a great Twitter follow as well:
https://twitter.com/timmodryoid 

I hope this is but the first of many visits as this bright young man has a keen mind and a warm and  welcoming heart.
